levels.description:
Passive: Summons may be deployed on melee tiles
Active: Ling and her summons gain <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> ATK and <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</> ASPD. The summons deal <@ba.vup>Arts damage</>
<@ba.rem>Immediately gain 1 summon when the skill is activated</>
